event: developmental delays in growth and motor function
immunosuppression with prednisolone, mycophenolate mofetil (MMF), and tacrolimus
urinalysis with red blood cell (RBC) count > 100/high power fields (HPF)
urinalysis with white blood cell (WBC) count > 100/HPF
negative urine culture for bacteria and BK virus
positive urine John Cunningham (JC) virus polymerase chain reaction (PCR)
negative sputum, blood, and urine culture results
positive adenovirus real-time PCR of sputum
presumed diagnosis of disseminated adenovirus infection
negative staining for CD3 and C4d
treatment with ganciclovir, antibiotic therapy, granulocyte colony-stimulating factor, immunoglobulin, transfusion, and hemodialysis
persistent high inflammatory marker and fever
change in cidofovir regimen to 2 mg/kg every 2 weeks
treatment with vancomycin, meropenem, and acyclovir
intensive care, including mechanical ventilation and continuous renal replacement therapy
